thread.title: This Furball Looks Like Studio Ghibli’s Soot Sprite (10+ Pics)
thread.title_full: This Furball Looks Like Studio Ghibli’s Soot Sprite (10+ Pics)

author: Giedrė
title: This Furball Looks Like Studio Ghibli’s Soot Sprite (10+ Pics)
text:
Not your original work? Add source 
We all know and adore the tiny dust bunnies from Studio Ghibli's animated world, where strange creatures and phantoms draw our eye. Well, this raven-haired feline looks like a black soot that's come alive! With a tuft of fluffy black fur and two huge dark eyes to his name, it's no wonder that this cute cat is being compared to the notorious soot sprite all over the internet. The Scottish fold named Gimo is mesmerizing people with his hypnotic gaze that you simply cannot resist! Check out these photos and see if you can handle that much cuteness in one place.
